revised_title: Advancements in Lunar Selenography and the Potential of Photographic Techniques
tldr: The author discusses the progress of lunar selenography and suggests a systematic approach to represent the physical aspect of the Moon using a combination of eye-draughts and photography. He emphasizes the importance of continuous work with a dedicated instrument for selected parts of the Moon and the potential of photographic techniques in enhancing the accuracy and detail of lunar maps.
